description:
This course is designed to introduce the undergraduate student to the structure of tissues at the cellular level and to the way in which those tissues are assembled into organs. This knowledge of structure will be the basis for discussion of tissue and organ function. 

Lab fee $150.
name: HISTOLOGY

values.comments: Overall, students were very enthusiastic about the course and Professor Weil. Students found her approachable and invested in student learning, although thought her lecture could be more dynamic. Regardless, many students found the class enjoyable, practical, and that they “learned a whole lot!”
